pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Case 1 Best-Worst Scaling // Provides three basic functions that support an implementation of object case (Case 1) best-worst scaling: one for converting a two-level orthogonal main-effect design/balanced incomplete block design into questions; one for creating a data set suitable for analysis; and one for calculating count-based scores. For details on best-worst scaling, see Louviere et al. (2015) doi:10.1017/CBO9781107337855.
